description: A simple Flutter application defining a main widget, a home page with a scaffold, an app bar, and centered text with a loading indicator.

classes.name: MyApp
classes.description: A StatelessWidget that sets up the MaterialApp with theme and home page.

classes.name: MyHomePage
classes.description: A StatefulWidget that displays the main content with a customizable title.

classes.name: _MyHomePageState
classes.description: State class for MyHomePage that builds the Scaffold containing AppBar and centered loading text.

methods.name: main
methods.description: Entry point of the Flutter app, calling runApp with MyApp.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Build method for MyApp and _MyHomePageState, constructing the widget tree.
